Edison International's $1.5 million scholarship program is now accepting applications from students who want to pursue careers in science, technology, engineering or math (STEM). Designed to develop the next generation of innovators, thinkers and problem-solvers, the Edison Scholars program awards scholarships, paid over four years.

result.title: ADDING MULTIMEDIA / Now Available: Wildfire Recovery Compensation Program for Eaton Fire
result.text: ROSEMEAD, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Starting today, eligible individuals and businesses can submit claims to receive fast payments and fair resolutions for direct impacts from the Eaton Fire through Southern California Edison's Wildfire Recovery Compensation Program. We listened to more than a thousand voices and learned what matters most to those impacted by the Eaton Fire: clarity, fairness and speed, said Pedro Pizarro, president and CEO of Edison International, the parent company of SCE. .
